title: What's Wrong With the Panthers and Can We Still Believe in the Colts?
itunes:title: What's Wrong With the Panthers and Can We Still Believe in the Colts?
description:
The Good Morning Football Crew discusses what is wrong with the Panthers (3:17). The gang also discusses what they learned from week 13 (18:48). Lastly, Kay Adams, Nate Burleson, Peter Schrager, and Kyle Brandt discuss their underappreciated storylines (33:43). Be sure to check in every Wednesday to the GMFB podcast! Like, share, subscribe! (45:10)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
